captions.text: "It will relieve you from all your miseries."
"He was the man of the greatest merit."
"...and defeated Ravan and brought back Sita as well."
Let me tell this tale of the Golden era."
"...and chant the praises of Lord Ram and Mother Sita."
"It will relieve you from your miseries."
"He was the man of the greatest merit."
"Lord Ram was the man of the greatest order."
"Son of Air God, Hanuman, was Lord Ram's devotee."
"Then Lord Ram got his wife, Mother Sita back."
"Lord Ram was the man of the greatest order."
"Son of Air God Hanuman was Lord Ram's devotee."
"Lord Ram went to Lanka and defeated Ravan."
"He is going back to Ayodhya as a hero."
"With a smile on his face and bow on his shoulder."
"People were hailing Ram after Ravan was killed in Lanka."
"Following Ram was his loyal brother Lakshman."
"They were talking about Ram and Sita in every village."
"People came in hordes to see Ram with his army."
"...when they got a glimpse of Lord Ram and Mother Sita."
No one is ready to take the responsibility...
...all the students of the MK Gandhi Medical College...
Their demand from the government is to...
...find the students who went missing from Janjhar district...
...and carry out an investigation on it...
...and send the CBI for the same.
The Indian government is in deep slumber.
We won't put up with this inefficiency.
The Indian government is in deep slumber.
We won't put up with this inefficiency.
Along with the Delhi police, the Jhanjhar police...
...is also trying to wash their hands off this case.
No one is ready to take the responsibility...
We have with us the friend of those three students...
...and the student president of this place. Ramesh Jain.
Mr. Ramesh, can you tell us when you last spoke to those students?
- On 26th October, the day they went missing.
What did you talk to them about?
...that the Jhanjhar police had arrested them...
So do you know why they went to Jhanjhar?
Dhiresh and Gautam went to Dinu's village...
They were supposed to come back the next day.
It's been two months since then.
But till now we've got to know nothing about them.
And the police and the government's response...
...to the whole affair is extremely irresponsible...
'... seem to be the best words to describe...
Sir, we would like to ask you a question...
Because of it MK Gandhi Medical  College you will have to answer.
Sir, we would like to know what the government is doing.
Sir, it's been two months since the students went missing.
Why is the government not taking a serious step?
That's not true. The government is trying its level best.
Sir, what will be government's next step?
For that we have chosen a CBI team...
Please give it to me sir.
Come, we shall talk on the way.
At such a beautiful and serene place...
Crimes like booth-capturing are taking place.
And that, too, thrice the number in Delhi and Mumbai.
The complaints of most of the crimes are not registered.
the army will have to leave the border...
...and come and put up a tent here in this village.
So what you mean to say is that whatever is written...
These documents are the proof of the inefficiency...
...of the government officials sitting in AC rooms.
People living in the city are far away from the truth.
I am old enough to be in-charge of two high-profile enquiries...
...and because of that I am sent here...
In the army, my commander used to say...
"If you hit the target right,you are on top.
If not, may God help you".
This is the only lodge in Jhanjhar.
A lot of woodwork goes on in this area, sir.
Sir, with great difficulty, we got just one room.
You two will have to share it, sir.
Where did you set up the office?
We got an old theatre, sir.
The negotiations are going on, sir.
We will strike a deal in a day or two.
I need to meet Mr. Vibhuti.
Sir is busy in a VIP meeting.
Sit there and wait for a while.
He says that we may kill him in an encounter.
Who cares about the Delhi government?
That scoundrel. Again he paid Rs. 100 less.
Brother, if I wish I can even kill...
...his wife and kids and his whole family in an encounter.
Now will I have to teach you how much time it takes...
...to turn a property case into a rape case?
I see. Okay, the goods are original?
he says his goat entered Mr. Chaubey's garden by mistake.
These girls always try to exploit us.
How much longer will it take?
I told you that he is busy with a VIP in the meeting.
Do you know all the VIPs of our region?
I will ring the bell and call you.
I will wait for another five minutes...
got a call from Delhi that someone's coming.
Did you have tea and snacks?
We need some information about those three boys.
why have these Delhi officials created such havoc unnecessarily?
We have no idea at all.
But they call us everyday and trouble us.
...those boys made the last call from Jhanjhar.
...that the Jhanjhar police has arrested them...
Does anyone know if there is some other police station...
Those boys must've gone somewhere else.
And anyway, the kids of this generation...
They must've gone to Mumbai or  somewhere else to have some fun.
And they sent you here from Delhi unnecessarily.
Tell us if we can do anything else for you.
We will call you if there's anything else.
You'll get pure water in that well.
Just tell us where we'll get Rukumlal.
You will find him at work.
Why are you talking to him?
The people here are quite afraid of the police.
By the way, who is this Rukumlal?
He must know something about him.
Two months ago Dinu came to the village with his two buffalos.
He came to the village and didn't meet...
He must've met someone in the village.
Did he have any enmity with anyone?
You are twiddling thumbs over here?
Come on, get back to work. Come on.
how much is 8 multiplied by 7? 54 or 56?
I don't know where he... - Juni,
Keep that book there and have your meal.
Look who's there at the door.
The officials are here. Come inside.
Last night some guys took father away.
Can you tell me who took Rukumlal away?
Don't ask me any questions, sir.
Yes, so did you file a complaint in the police station?
that we want to help you?
Oh, God. What is wrong with everybody?
Why doesn't anyone say anything here?
In the last six months, eleven people...
Their dead bodies were recovered from railway tracks...
And still you don't file a complaint in the police station.
If investigated, the cause of death...
Because neither is there any complaint,
Is everyone blind in this neighborhood?
Only those have been kidnapped from here...
we are from CBI, from Delhi.
At least one of you say something.
Sir, we would be thankful to you
if you leave us in our condition.
Last night there was an attack on Dinu's home.
His brother-in-law Rukumlal has been kidnapped.
Have you taken any action yet?
Why are you getting so furious?
The police department of our country takes an action...
What else do you want now?
That I should go to everyone's home every day and ask...
do you have any complaint to file?
"And while we are at it, shall we also send some groceries for you?"
I am warning you, SP sir.
If I write in my report that the Jhanjhar police...
...is supporting the criminals, then you know...
...what could be the consequences very well.
Go and bring a cold drink for sir.
These city people get heated up very soon.
You're on the computer since a long time.
Mother has sent the photos of some girls...
I left that decision to mother.
She will get me married as soon as I go back.
Why are the villagers so afraid to talk?
Now it's a part of their lives.
I will tell you an interesting story.
There's a small village at about 80 kms from here.
A poor 'Dalit' (Low social class) family used to live there.
'Mother, father, two daughters, one son' types.
They bought a farm with their lifelong earnings.
Got a good harvest from the farm.
Got some money from the harvest.
With that money, they bought two cows.
One day when the 'Thakur' (Village head) of the village...
...was passing by, he commented in friendly banter...
"Do you want to become a landlord like me or what?"
"...and lead even better lives than the Thakurs".
The Thakur thought of it not as a joke,
but a slap in the face.
That night when the family returned...
...for the whole family and said..."Don't worry".
The father had mixed poison in the sweets.
...you will get to hear  such stories everyday here.
This fear is deep-rooted in them.
By the way, what does that boy do nowadays?
Right now he's ironing his shirt.
since poison didn't work for me...
"Like the silver rays of the moon" - My darling!
"My body would be afire and extinguished every now and then."
"The nights come knocking at my door."
"And the words are filled with spice."
"The nights come knocking at my door."
"And the words are filled with spice."
"It plays hide and seek with us."
"At least say it now, you mischievous girl."
"It plays hide and seek with us."
"At least say it now, you mischievous girl."
"Don't torment us like this. Don't torment us like this."
"There are thousands to buy the body."
"But I didn't find a trader for my heart."
"You're mad in this lane of hearts."
"You're mad in this moment of madness. - Mad. Mad."
"You're mad in this lane of hearts."
"You're mad in this moment of madness."
"I have tasted jaggery and sugar candy with a smile."
Look, Chacha Choudhary and Sabu (Comic characters)...
...have come to our house from Delhi.
I feel like drinking acid and sacrificing my life for you.
Come, I will introduce you to my
he is the brother-in-law of the headman here.
Shake hands. Why are you feeling shy?
...with a trident in your hand like Lord Shiva (Indian God)?
There was an attack on our lodge just now.
They threw a burning trident into our room.
Hail Lord Shiva. Hail Lord Shiva. Hail Lord Shiva.
Do you know who they were?
We didn't come here to drink.
You will have to drink today.
bring the English liquor from the mirror cabinet.
Who is the leader of this Shool Army?
no one has any clue as to who is this Shool Army?
That it rules over the entire area.
And let me tell you something.
Consider this attack to be a warning.
He could've finished you off if he wanted to.
Brother, who am I to threaten you?
I was just narrating a story.
Are you getting it or you want a beating from me?
Today she'll be killed at my hands.
I am so unfortunate to have married you.
There was only one bottle left.
You've humiliated me before the guests.
Sir, will the local liquor do?
Now why are you staring at my face?
You witch. Will you be happy when the glass gets into...
...two armed policemen outside the lodge 24 hours a day.
We are as it is short of manpower.
To look after the law and order.
More than half of them are stationed...
Rest get vegetables from the market.
I'll complain about you directly to the DGP...
...if I don't get protection by tomorrow morning.
You seem quite upset since last night.
Look, we can't open the dam now.
Sir, our fields will be ruined.
Nothing doing. I will not listen to anything.
There is a problem. Don't you understand?
Couldn't he have said this before?
the chief engineer has shut the outflow of water from the dam.
That's why the farmers are enraged.
Moreover, it hasn't rained this year.
If the water from the dam is stopped...
...the entire yield here will get ruined, sir.
I had made a wish for you at Shankar Teela yesterday.
You'll surely be able to conceive.
Last night they kidnapped my husband.
I guess sir knows who they are.
Please ask sir to save him.
Apply the mud pack on the rest of the utensils and leave.
You're here to get a haircut?
So much of dust flies around in the village.
So I thought of combing my hair a little.
It becomes very difficult to keep yourself clean.
ir wants to know your name.
That's why you are so conscious about cleanliness.
What difference does it make with...
...regards to cleanliness if I am a Brahmin?
Believe it or not, Son. It does. And that, too, in the entire country.
People in the city wash their hands...
...if some guy from a low caste touches them.
But I don't let the need to wash hands arise here.
Sir, the one who bowled is a Muslim.
And the one who took the catch belongs to a low caste.
And the ones who are hugging both of them...
...comprise of Brahmins, Sikhs and Kshatriyas, too.
I wish we could learn something from cricket.
Many bigwigs have come to teach us.
But I wonder where they disappear.
We get tired looking for them ourselves.
You came here to look for some boys, didn't you?
How far has your investigation reached?
The Shool Army attacked him last night.
But let him save his own life first.
Then he can save someone else's life.
The thing is that when the press and media...
has to play out a drama.
It has to form an inquiry committee.
There is a hue and cry for a couple of days.
And then when Indian wins a match, everything's forgotten.
Everything's just get erased from the people's mind.
That's why I suggest, write whatever you feel like...
...in the report and go back to Delhi.
Why are you getting your hair spoilt...
...in the dust and mud of this village?
Brother, the eggplants I had bought from you...
...last time were absolutely rotten from the inside.
Geeta, I want to talk to you.
Don't do this the next time.
Brother, how much for these tomatoes?
Ma'am, why are you asking the price?
- I would've delivered the vegetables home.
This is a dead body. It's a police matter.
Take him to the hospital before the media...
God forbid, if he dies, we'll have to face the media.
Which hospital are you taking him to?
Whatever happens in our area is our headache.
Just stick to the task you're here for.
I had lodged the FIR about him.
Now do you want to suck the life out of us?
Rukumlal is the only link to this case.
It's pertinent that we find about his kidnappers before he dies.
If we chase,he'll die for sure.
By now you must've realized that we can't...
...carry out the investigation in public like this.
Am I doing an investigation for the first time?
But the law here is different from that of the other countries.
Here every heart is under terror.
No one will open their mouth even by mistake.
We'll not have to go back empty-handed.
The car of those three boys has been found.
God comes to our aide in various disguises.
This time he came in the disguise of the chief engineer.
The one who shut the water of this dam.
The moment the water level receded...
It exposed the roof of the car.
Then the name of this God is co-incidence.
Sir, not much. Some bottles of soft drinks.
An earring and a mobile phone.
I guess there was a girl with those boys that night.
But, sir, we haven't got a report about any missing girl yet.
Send this SIM card to Delhi.
Find out in whose name was this registered.
And to what numbers were calls last made from this number.
This car did not fall? It was made to fall.
There is not even a scratch on the headlights and the grills.
Get a specimen of this. Please.
I think this car was dropped into the water with a crane.
This mark on such a high railing...
...could be only because of the arms of the crane.
Find out who has a red colored crane in Jhanjhar district.
Send for a rescue team of lady divers.
Two loincloths. And a left sandal.
had drowned along with her mug.
Say goodbye to her from a distance.
The CBI guys are selling fish.
They are eventually doing their job.
The rent for this entire theatre just Rs. 10000 per month?
You'll get the entire village on rent here for Rs. 10000.
we've found four red cranes from this area.
All four are registered in the name of Sughna Gilgit, Sir.
And the paint specimen we took from the railing of the bridge...
...matches with one of the cranes, sir.
And its report is in this file.
Sughna Gilgit is famous among the locals as Nasbandi.
That's because he stabs all his victims...
...in their private parts and kills them.
I've got Rakesh on the job, sir.
We'll get the rest of the information very soon as well.
Come on, drink from your cup.
one Paya Shorba, one Tandoori Chicken...
...two plates of Nalli Kebab, one Raan, one Bheja fry...
...and a crisp Tandoori Roti (Indian delicacies). Make it quick.
If I don't get the money, I'll strangle Gajodhar.
Tell him that it's a treat from brother Pratap. Go.
You idiot. You want to splurge on this?
It's time to fix you up.
Here are some medicines. Buy some medicine?
God. How did they come in?
He drives like a blind man.
What is that jeep doing outside?
Why are you creating a scene?
Do you even know what he did?
The brakes of his car weren't working.
Some lunatic jumped before his car. Got ran over and died.
What could he do if that poor guy ran out of luck?
If he had stayed there, the people...
...would've beaten him to death as well.
That's why he directly came under my refuge.
At first, I also took him to be a fraud and did not believe him.
That's why I sent the car directly to the workshop.
The brakes of his car were indeed not working.
We want to investigate in our way.
Sir, we'll have to complete certain formalities.
We'll take him to the hospital first.
He'll be examined to see if he's drunk.
Then he'll be presented in the court.
And I can hand him over to you only after all this.
As you can see, I've got my hands full.
So please don't disturb me anymore.
I have some official questions to ask you.
Where were you on the night of the 26th of October?
When did your husband come back home?
After that, did he go out somewhere?
No. He was watching TV at home.
How can you say that I'm lying?
"She bats her eyelids when it comes to lies."
"She can't lie even if she wants to."
"It should be a straightforward deal. Keep it simple."
"Either I have to get you or you have to lose me."
"It should be a straightforward deal. Keep it simple."
"Either I have to get you or you have to lose me."
Come on, trade it for mine.
"You may make me swear by the deal."
"It's a deal of our flight or of the skies."
"Take away my flight and my wings as well."?
"It's a deal of hopes. Of dreams and sleep."
"And dwell in my eyes as well."
"It should be a straightforward deal. Keep it simple."
"Either I have to get you or you have to lose me."
"It should be a straightforward deal. Keep it simple."
"Either I have to get you or you have to lose me."
It's a very proud day for our...
Mr. Pratap Kumar, a student of this school...
...but the entire region proud in the entire...
Now I would like captain Pratap Kumar...
...to come here and say a few words of encouragement to our kids.
I want to say just one thing to all you kids.
Don't ever be ashamed of your caste.
A person's caste doesn't make him good or bad.
His deeds make him good or bad.
My parents passed away in my childhood.
Since then, he has raised and brought me up.
Pratap, I want to ask for something from you.
I hope that you won't turn me down.
You've endured a lot of pain and sorrow so far.
You can figure out from your past...
...how cruel the life in this village is.
Here the entire family has to pay the price...
27 years ago I had the strength to fight the world.
Perhaps that's why  I could bring you home.
I won't be able to fight today.
I have two other daughters besides Geeta.
If you got married to Geeta...
...the society will make their lives miserable.
It will be difficult for them to even venture out of the house.
either hang themselves on a fan...
Son, this heart has always given you blessings.
Don't force it to curse you.
I would think that I got my fees.
Pratap, why have you come back to remind me...
I just want the answers to my questions.
Your husband wasn't at home on the night of the 26th of October.
And you know where he was.
Pratap, you've to listen to this.
That SIM we found in the car that day...
Her father's name is Thakur Omkar Sukul.
He is an ex-minister of this place.
All the ministers here are in his pocket.
This investigation is going to get ugly.
I'm sorry. We came to your house uninvited.
Call your daughter Roshini out please.
She wanted to ask us something...
You're asking where my daughter is in my own house.
You won't get to meet Roshini.
Thakur sir, don't take my decency to be my weakness.
We've certain evidence on the basis on which...
...I can even arrest Roshini if I want to.
I clean my bottom in the morning with papers like these.
what I say becomes the law here.
Take her away if you have the guts.
I shall change my name if these guys don't rip you apart.
Take off as soon as you can.
If I lost it, I'll shove the evidence down your throat.
Ask your men to lower their guns.
Now tell me who the sycophant is.
I did not hear you. Say it loudly.
I am... - Pratap, it's an order.
We are sent here to find the evidence and witnesses.
So that we can present a strong case in the court.
And that gun has been given to us for our protection.
We have to give an account for every bullet that we fire.
There's a system to the way we work. Oh, God.
There are protocols to be followed.
Here the system is that if someone abuses you, rip his tongue out.
And if someone's word is the final word...
...then you've to keep your gun in his mouth 24 hours a day.
Don't tell me your way of working.
I know exactly what I am doing.
You were sent here to help me.
What's this... You have also... Hello. Yes.
We have come to take Roshini into custody.
Please co-operate or else we will have to...
On the night of the 26th October, you were with those boys.
that was obtained from their vehicle.
...you made your last 17 calls to those guys.
Do you want to say anything in your defense?
Look, the story is very simple.
...and you used to pretend to love him, just to have fun.
Your family fixed your marriage with a rich man...
...he came to your village with his friends to meet you.
If Dinu had revealed the truth about you here...
...then your family's reputation would've been completely ruined.
And to save yourself from this disgrace...
...to take you and your family to the gallows.
The truth is that you got Dinu killed.
Dinu was the brightest boy in the school.
That's why he even got a seat in a medical college in Delhi.
But they were all against this relationship.
That's why they fixed my marriage with Vijay Singh.
When I told Dinu about this,
...along with some of his friends to meet me.
That night, there was 'Ram Leela' (Play about Lord Ram).
Hail Lord Ram Chandra. - Hail the Lord.
"Lord Ram went to Lanka and defeated Ravan."
"Ram is going back to Ayodhya as a hero."
"With a smile on his face and a bow on his shoulder."
"People were hailing Ram after Ravan was killed in Lanka."
"Following Ram was his loyal brother Lakshman."
"They were talking about Ram and Sita in every village."
"People came in hordes at the place at which Ram went with his army."
They are my closest friends. Dhiresh and Gautam.
Their families have great influence in Delhi.
Yes, once we reach Delhi, we are out of danger.
What if my father learns about it?
By that time we will be married.
They have made all the arrangements.
As soon as we reach Delhi, we will get married in the court.
Hey, you look in the front.
I told you... Father won't spare us now.
Aren't you ashamed to do this? - Dinu.
Papa, let me go. Leave me. Papa.
I don't know anything more than that.
My family kept me locked in a room for two months.
And they had high-power torches in their hands.
I couldn't see anyone's face properly.
I could only hear their names.
Can you identify any of them?
Sir, is it true that headman Omkar Sukul's daughter...
...Roshini Sukul is the prime witness of this case?
Right now the investigation is going on.
Once the report is filed, all of you will know about it.
He is working for me since 20 years.
There was no problem at all till date.
We treat him like a member of our family.
If my son gets carried away tomorrow...
...then I, along with the people of my caste...
Not just you, none of us have seen them. - Sir. Sir.
...of the central government to defame the state government.
Once our party comes in power in the central government...
...we will show who has the upper hand.
We believe that the truth always comes out victorious.
We went in and came out.
She was confused like Gandhari (Mythological character).
The CBI scared her a lot before presenting her.
She won't recognize anyone, will she?
But the CBI failed completely. - Really?
It will be fun when people will shout "Shame, Shame" at them.
There's an army of journalists outside.
Keep both your mouth and temper in control.
These CBI people who are walking around with pride...
...are the ones who should be taken to the gallows.
Sir, is it true that the police is also involved in this...
...and that they are trying to protect the real culprit?
And the CBI commander is a member of the untouchable community?
Were you the one to frame Dinu?
Some people even think that the police is behind...
...the disappearance of the three guys. Your comment?
Move back. - Tell us. - Move back.
Sir, Roshini has taken your name during the CBI investigation?
There are many persons in the village with that name. Go.
Yes, but there must be only one policeman with that name, right?
Move back. Will you get inside now?
Move back. No one saw anything here.
Why are you beating me up? What wrong have I done?
I am sorry, Brother. Don't beat me up, Brother.
Many of our people were kidnapped.
we couldn't muster the courage to feel their pain.
We just keep worrying about our own lives cowards like cowards.
We weren't strong enough to fight them.
But we have to unite now...
The atrocities that we have been facing since ages...
...we will have to raise our voice against them.
Hey, I heard that your wife is gorgeous.
Let me have her someday as well.
Start the commotion. I will stop from behind.
Hey, give it to me. Give it to me.
The way to the court is closed.
All of you go home. It's my order. Go.
All are from the CBI, sir.
The court's verdict is that the investigation officers...
...don't have any reason to keep Roshini Sukul in custody.
...anyone in particular in the required time...
The investigation officers were unable to prove...
And what is the reason behind their killing?
Due to lack of concrete evidence against...
...SP Azad Shatru Singh and other police officers...
During the course of this case, the investigation officers...
...but they completely failed to present any witness in the court.
using their power and also the government resources.
Other than that they are also found guilty of...
...and sensationalizing this case with the help of media.
The court gives them a strict warning regarding this.
And if they are so desperate to be on TV...
...they could work in some melodramatic TV serial.
They will become heroes on their own.
This case is dismissed right here.
My Brothers, ours is the only country in the whole world...
...where we have to fill our name, caste and religion...
This classification of castes has not been done today.
It's been there since several years.
Our ancestors classified us among castes...
I will shoot you if you come forward.
You eat my food and point the gun at me?
Does anyone amongst you know who did all this?
Someone show some courage and come forward...
...and tell me who did all this.
You came here to look for the three guys, right?
Because of you more than 300 have been killed or injured here.
CBI has become a joke in the whole country today.
There's a lot of pressure on me from the top authorities.
I don't want to be the scapegoat anymore.
Write whatever you want to write.
Give me the final report as soon as possible.
This is not just about Dinu and his friends anymore.
Now it's about the age-old disparities...
I haven't come here from Delhi to hear...
wasted a huge amount of time and money of the CBI.
Close the case. Shut the office.
Every fool thinks that on joining hands in the temple...
his sins will be washed away.
But today's God is also quite smart.
...who puts up with whatever nonsense her husband dishes out.
That's why every man wants a wife like you.
She will do whatever you say.
that a woman is not just a wife...
Think about what the mothers and...
...sisters of those three boys must be going through.
Only then will you realize their pain.
Sorry. I didn't come here to lecture you.
I just came to tell you that I am leaving.
Last time I had left without telling you.
This time, I thought I should tell you before leaving.
So long till we meet again.
Did you bring the rice? Why don't you get it down?
Just a couple of minutes ago.
Take a right. Take a right.
Don't blame me if something happens to you.
but her condition is very critical.
She'll never be able to speak again.

comments.author: Lone Bilal

comments.text:
This movie is almost a SCENE-BY-SCENE COPY of Mississippi Burning, with 
some Indian masala added. I could even predict the scenes quite accurately 
just by recollecting the corresponding scene from Mississippi Burning.

For starters.....

Ajay Devgan = Rupert Anderson (Gene Hackman)
Akshaye Khanna = Alan Ward (William Dafoe)

Even their personalities match so closely!!!

Paresh Raval = Clinton Pell
Bipasha Basu = Mrs Pell
Shool Sena = Ku Klux Klan

Check out Mississippi Burning and you'll know what I'm talking about. 

And I'm surprised with the "based on a true story" claim, as the plagiarism 
is TOOOOO obvious!


﻿
